data.text: @roonnaa_ggee73 Hi Queen. Yes, cooked ham for personal consumption is allowed in your hand carry as long as it does not emit strong odors.  Please ensure that it's properly packed and sealed to avoid any spills in the cabin. Thanks!

@MBrattinela Hi Marie. If you’re bringing a 2 checked baggage , you may opt to purchase two (2) 20kg checked baggage, a total of 40 kgs.Or combination of Twenty (20) kilograms per piece baggage and Thirty – Two (32) kg per piece baggage, maximum of Two (2) pieces baggage in total. Thanks!

data.text: @_iamemman Hi Emman. We will be glad to look into your concern. To further assist you and the security of your personal information, please send us a  message  via Charlie the chatbot  thru: https://t.co/zvAz6wDXJv, and ask Charlie to connect you to a live chat agent. Thanks!

@ANNsuperholic Please be advised that promo seats are limited and subject to availability. If the seats allotted for the promo rate are already sold out, the site will display the next available rate. Thank you and see you on board.

@ANNsuperholic Hi Kath! There is no promo code for the latest seat sale. Simply visit https://t.co/kPgrcWAGam to book your flight. Note that Promo seats are limited. If the seats allotted for the promo rates are already sold out, the site will display the next available rate.
@_iamemman May I ask the reason why the guests won't be able to take the flight? Thank you!
@roonnaa_ggee73 Hi Queen! Tel here. May I ask if this is for carry-on? Thank you!
@roonnaa_ggee73 Hi Queen! Tel here. May we know your concern? Thank you!

@VaughnVonito Hi Von! Tel here. We sincerely apologize for the inconvenience. We want all our guests to have a smooth worry free travel but there are reasons that are beyond our control which forced us to cancel or defer schedules of some flights. Thank you!
@_iamemman Hi Emman! Tel here. Please be advised that voluntary cancellation is not allowed. Thank you!

@chatamz_93 Hi Cha! Tel here. I will be glad to look into it. Can I have your case number so I could reach out to the case owner? Please monitor the email used in filing this case. Thanks for your patience!

@archie_twt Thanks for raising the concern, arch. To check on it, kindly message us thru https://t.co/GI0vBw2OWK and chat with our live chat agents or send an email thru our Guest Feedback Form via this link: (https://t.co/7yR2XSIMwc). We'll wait for you there, Thank you.

@veeyoutifull Hi boo! Yes, you can bring a hair drier and hair styling tools in your hand carry, as long as it fits in the dimensions for hand carry and its cables are detachable. Please pack it properly to avoid breakage. Thank you
@ra12man We are sorry to hear this, joseph. In that case, you may send the concern thru our Guest Feedback Form via this link: (https://t.co/7yR2XSIMwc). We'll wait for you there, Thank you.
@mariaariamX Hi Maria! Since flight is to Legazpi, no other requirement is needed aside from the PSA Birth Certificate of the minor passenger. Thank you

@vhansrui2315 Thank you for raising the concern and we are sorry to hear the inconvenience you may have felt, @vhansrui2315. To check on this further, kindly message us thru https://t.co/GI0vBw2OWK and start chatting with our live agents. We'll wait for you there, Thanks!

@mfjonson HI Mark. Yes, you can bring a drone in your checked baggage. Please make sure to pack it safely (in bubble wrap and in a shock-proof box)  to avoid any damages. we will be asking you to sign a Limited Release Tag as well. Kindly check this link (https://t.co/lXA1Cho2q6).Thanks!
@_iamemman Hi Emman! Tel here. May we ask why you want to cancel the flight? Thank you!

@AbbasSoudery Hi Soudery . You may purchase prepaid baggage allowance upon booking and up to 2 hours before your flight via our website(https://t.co/5TLfYWv7EF) . For more information on prepaid baggage, click here https://t.co/lXA1Cho2q6. Thanks!

@izahmuninio Hi Izah. Remember, all  documents/ IDs presented are subject to airports discretion and profiling.   For complete travel guidelines, you may check our  frequently asked questions (FAQs) via  https://t.co/lBwTdCJvJb. Hope this helps.  Have a great day ahead!
@izahmuninio HI Izah! Tel here. Voter's ID must be presented upon check-in. Thank you!

@she_dadadera Hi She! Tel here. You can no longer add a child to confirmed booking. You can book the child as an adult then message us to correct the date of birth. Thank you!

@MsConnieFranco Hi Apple. Regret if you feel that way.  The fare will depend on the date and time of your flight. It's best to book your flight far ahead of time, to  find early booking deals/promos and discounts. Thanks!

Fly as soon as you book this #CEBSeatSale! For as low as PHP88 (one-way base fare, exclusive of fees and surcharges), you can fly to Boracay, Davao, and to other domestic destinations from Dec 1, 2022 - May 31, 2023 if you book NOW until Dec 15, 2022 via https://t.co/taKDgpUG24 https://t.co/H8Cv1J7lDO

@Captain_CHICH You may call them at at +632 8 859 2774 . It will help if you have your CEB TravelSure confirmation number at hand. Alternatively, you may email them at CEBTravelSure.ph@chubb.com. Thank you!

data.text: @Captain_CHICH Hi Chich! Tel here. CEB TravelSure is underwritten by our travel insurance partner who will assist you with your requirement. In compliance with insurance regulations in the Philippines, the Chubb Customer Service Team should handle your required changes in your coverage.

@mariaariamX Hi Maria. How are you doing? Sha here.  To check the available schedules and  great value fares of  Legazpi flight, please visit our website at https://t.co/bU2K2M97fc.  We hope to see you on board soon. Thanks!
@idkcary Hi Idkcary. Dimension for handcarry is  up to 56cm x 36cm x 23cm.  For more information, kindly use this link: https://t.co/lXA1Cho2q6 and https://t.co/EhmSrp2L5V. Thanks!

data.text: @capttysteve Sorry for the confusion, Acbucoy. As checked, a flat screen TV is not allowed in your checked baggage due to the possibility of damages. Thank you and see you on board.

@Maebzy For only PHP 99 base fare, these vouchers may be redeemed on any Cebu Pacific and Cebgo domestic destination 30 to 7 days before the
intended date of departure, subject to availability (see CEB Super Pass Terms and Conditions). Thank you!

@Maebzy Hi Maebz! The CEB Super Pass is a single-use voucher that provides everyJuan added flexibility in  planning their trips! Passengers have the option to choose and redeem flights without the 
pressure of planning too far ahead.
@capttysteve You're welcome, Acbunoy!

@capttysteve Hi acbucoy! Tel here. I will be glad to look into it. Can I have your case number so I could reach out to the case owner? Please monitor the email used in filing this case. Thanks for your patience!

@capttysteve Hi acbucoy! For a better CEB customer experience, we're moving all of our chat engagements here: https://t.co/GI0vBw2OWK. Click on the link and start chatting with Charlie the Chatbot and our live agents! We'll wait for you there, Thanks!

@MaxHaye13680696 HI Max. Promo seats are limited. If the seats allotted for the promo rates are already sold out, the site will display the next available rate. You may try another date instead. Thank you.
@athensgarrote We are glad to hear this, Athens. Thank you for the appreciation and thank you also for choosing us on your travel. Hope to see you again soon! Have a great day

@charmimargaret We are sorry if you feel that way. For further assistance, you may also accomplish our Guest Feedback Form through this link https://t.co/7yR2XSIMwc and we will respond to you through the email you provided. Thank you.
@nyaa_miu Hi MiuNyaa! You may use these IDs for check-in as long as it has your complete name, photo, signature and date of birth. Thank you
@rumicah We are sorry for the inconvenience, @rumicah. May we have the case number of your transaction so we can check on it? Thanks

@multi_stan147 Hi there! Yes, you can bring a hair drier and hair styling tools in your hand carry, as long as it fits in the dimensions for hand carry and its cables are detachable. Also, please pack it properly to avoid breakage.  Thank you

@sobe21 You're most welcome sobe21!

@sobe21 Hi sobe21! Lechon for personal consumption is allowed in your hand carry as long as it fits the size limitation based on our baggage rules. Please ensure that it's properly packed and sealed to avoid any spills in the cabin. Learn more here https://t.co/rfiF2XaINK.

@antontabuena For damaged baggage caused by normal wear and tear such damaged to exterior handles, locks and the likes, we regret to inform you that the airline will not be held liable if the bag got damaged due to normal wear and tear. We are seeking for your understanding on this matter.

data.text: @antontabuena However, please do understand that the airline has no control on the shifting of weight of baggage inside the cargo hold during takeoff and landing of the aircraft. Also, during the transporting the baggage from aircraft to airport.
@antontabuena We understand where you are coming from. We would like to inform you that we do our best to handle the baggage of our guests with the most possible care.
@JeffersonTe4 Hi Jefferson! Tel here. May we know your concern? Thank you!

@antontabuena For damaged baggage caused by normal wear and tear such damaged to exterior handles and the likes, we regret to inform you that the airline will not be held liable if the bag got damaged due to normal wear and tear. Thank you!

@GreyBush97 Thank you for raising the concern, Bobby. To assist you further and to check on your concern, kindly message us thru https://t.co/GI0vBw2OWK and start chatting with our live agents. We'll wait for you there, Thanks!

@yursminjeong Hi Laurence! Food item that cannot be accepted for check-in may be included in your hand carry as long as this is in reasonable quantity or for personal consumption only. This should also fit underneath your seat. Thank you
@hotpinkgold HI Marina! Appreciate if you can provide the Customer Care Reference Number of the email/form you filed so we can check on it? Thank you
@dhrealicious11 We are sorry to hear this, Andresa. You may also send your concern thru our Guest Feedback Form via this link: (https://t.co/7yR2XSIMwc). We'll wait for you there, Thank you.

@asarahjkl Hi @asarahjkl. Thanks for reaching to us and we are sorry for any inconvenience you may have felt. For us to assist you, kindly message us thru https://t.co/GI0vBw2OWK and start chatting with our live agents. We'll wait for you there, Thanks!

@hotpinkgold We are sorry if you are having a hard time to connect with our live chat agent Marina. You may kindly accomplish our Guest Feedback Form thru this link https://t.co/7yR2XSIMwc and we will respond to you through the email you provided.

@maxerdompyy Hi Maxinne. You may submit instead a Medical Certification written on Doctor's Prescription Pad or Hospital /Clinic's Prescription Pad with License Number of Doctor indicated. Subject for  approval.

@maxerdompyy Apologies Maxinne. If due to medical reasons, requirement would be Medical Certificate and Doctor's PRC license; OR
Medical Certification written on Doctor's Prescription Pad or Hospital /Clinic's Prescription Pad with License Number of Doctor indicated.
@Marabels Hi marabels! Please be informed that all confirmed bookings are non-transferrable. Name change to another person is not allowed.
